dcterms:creator: J. Susskind
A. Anderson
G. E. Hinton
dcterms:description: The Toronto Face Dataset (TFD) is used to evaluate the performance of natural gradient descent in deep learning models, particularly in the context of using unlabeled data to improve generalization error.
dcterms:title: Toronto Face Dataset (TFD)

dcterms:creator: Y. Bengio

dcterms:description: The NISTP dataset is utilized to assess the robustness of natural gradient descent to the ordering of training examples, particularly in the context of deep learning models.
dcterms:title: NISTP dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Martens
dcterms:description: The Curves dataset is employed for benchmarking the performance of various optimization algorithms, including natural gradient descent and Hessian-free optimization.
dcterms:title: Curves dataset
